strategy_spec: name='My First Strategy' description='A simple mean reversion strategy' version='1.0.0' universe=['AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT'] start_date=datetime.datetime(2024, 8, 23, 14, 17, 0, 105852) end_date=datetime.datetime(2025, 8, 23, 14, 17, 0, 105862) features=[FeatureSpec(name='price_deviation', feature_type=<FeatureType.PRICE_BASED: 'price_based'>, lookback_period=20, parameters={'method': 'z_score'})] target=<TargetType.NEXT_DAY_RETURN: 'next_day_return'> target_lookback=1 entry_rules=EntryExitRule(condition='price_deviation < -1.5', lookback_period=5) exit_rules=EntryExitRule(condition='price_deviation > 0.5', lookback_period=3) holding_period=10 position_sizing=PositionSizing(method='fixed_size', volatility_target=None, risk_per_trade=None, max_position_size=0.2) max_positions=2 stop_loss=None take_profit=None cv_config=CrossValidationConfig(validation_type=<ValidationType.WALK_FORWARD: 'walk_forward'>, n_splits=3, train_size=0.7, purge_period=10, embargo_period=5) tags=[] author='Unknown' created_at=datetime.datetime(2025, 8, 23, 14, 17, 0, 106072)
